about_the_game:
MEET THORA!

Age: 27 years old

Zodiac Sign: Capricorn

Preferences: Sex cults, heavy firepower, nomadic lifestyle.

A fervent fanatic with an unshakable sense of justice, Thora experiences episodes of amnesia when she believes "God" is speaking to her. She is resolute and uncompromising, driven by the belief that salvation — for herself and others — is a path that must sometimes be paved with blood and sex cults.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Thora will not only be your loyal companion but also an inspiring muse! She will always accompany you on the main screen with her dynamic animations and captivating dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you’ll get Thora as your mascot! You can change your mascot anytime by opening your profile and selecting the “Mascot” tab.

Additionally, you’ll receive 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you’ll have our eternal gratitude! Thank you for considering this DLC purchase!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Thora
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Thora, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
